note:
📷 Photographs through the eyes of a painter.
🎨 Paintings from the liminal edge.
🥰 Grateful for every follow.
🧠 I dig smart, informative exchange, and am open to constructive feedback of my creative work.

My name is pronounced Mar-lay-nuh, like Marlene Dietrich. My work is © copyrighted upon first publishing.

Avatar is a 2022 photo of me from Zoom—thanks for making me look 10 years younger! 😉 Header photo is of three slim tree trunks and their colorful autumn leaves. I give good AltText. 😁
